full_summary:
## **Snow Removal Maintenance Services for Whitehorse Detachment Compound and Hangar**

### **Lowest Price Selection**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites proposals for Snow Removal Maintenance Services for the Whitehorse Detachment Compound and Hangar. The contract period will be for one year with an option to extend for up to two additional two-year periods. The anticipated work start date is October 1, 2024.

### **Scope of Work**

The Scope of Work includes furnishing all labor, materials, tools, and equipment required to provide snow removal services at the M-Division Whitehorse Detachment compound and hangar when requested and as specified in the contract documents.

### **Security Requirements**

The Contractor/Offeror personnel must hold a valid RCMP Facility Access Level 1 Status, granted or approved by the RCMP.

### **Optional Site Visit**

A site visit has been arranged for December 19, 2023, at the Whitehorse Detachment Compound and Hangar. Bidders are requested to communicate with the Contracting Authority via email to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

### **Selection Criteria**

A Bid must comply with the requirements of the RFP and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive Bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

### **Tender Information**

* **RFP Reference Number**: M8026-3-0056
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 11, 2024, 17:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31, 2025
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Amy Wang
	+ Royal Canadian Mounted Police
	+ (236) 330-3559
	+ E_Pacific_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

### **Documents**

RFP documents are available for download at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). Bidders must submit their proposals electronically to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit. Note: Tenders must be submitted in either official language of Canada.
